amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the IRS from using funds in the bill to collect taxes on certain disaster assistance grants that were provided to business and individuals in lower Manhattan after the September 11 terrorist attacks.

action.text: Mr. Istook raised a point of order against the Maloney amendment (A023). The amendment seeks to change existing law and constitutes legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
